code: import{clsx}from"clsx";import{twMerge}from"tailwind-merge";export function cn(){for(var _len=arguments.length,inputs=new Array(_len),_key=0;_key<_len;_key++){inputs[_key]=arguments[_key];}return twMerge(clsx(inputs));}export function formatDate(date){return new Date(date).toLocaleDateString("en-US",{year:"numeric",month:"long",day:"numeric"});}export function truncateText(text,maxLength){if(text.length<=maxLength)return text;return text.slice(0,maxLength)+"...";}
